## Discussion

Implement this method to return image data representing the shared recording. Returning `nil` tells the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance to display the generic image. Not implementing this method is the same as returning `nil`.

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingControllerDelegate/itemThumbnailData(for:)] is called only when creating a new share. For an existing share, the thumbnail image is retrieved from the share using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/cloudkit/cksharethumbnailimagedatakey] key.

# itemThumbnailData(for:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func itemThumbnailData(for csc: UICloudSharingController) -> Data?
```

## Discussion

Implement this method to return image data representing the shared recording. Returning `nil` tells the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance to display the generic image. Not implementing this method is the same as returning `nil`.

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingControllerDelegate/itemThumbnailData(for:)] is called only when creating a new share. For an existing share, the thumbnail image is retrieved from the share using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/cloudkit/cksharethumbnailimagedatakey] key.

The following code shows an example of retrieving the image data from a data set stored in an asset catalog found in the main bundle.

```swift
- (nullable NSData *)itemThumbnailDataForCloudSharingController:(UICloudSharingController *)csc
{  
  NSDataAsset *icon = [[NSDataAsset alloc] initWithName:@"thumbnail"];
  return [icon data];
}
```

## Configuring the view controller

- **itemTitle(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.
- **itemType(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the item.

items.description: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.
items.name: itemTitle(for:)
